summary: Overhauls the appearance of characters added by the lovely Anna NPCs mod, with permission from Anduniel. Not lore-friendly.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#1155Cc][size=5]﻿~Description~[/size][/color][size=3]
[size=4]Overhauls the appearance of characters added by the lovely Anna NPCs mod, with permission from Anduniel. Not lore-friendly. It uses an anime/fantasy aesthetic, for those who prefer that style, like me. [b][color=#3c78d8][i]It also makes them use default textures you have installed.[/i][/color][/b][/size][/size][size=4][b][color=#3c78d8]
[/color][/b][/size][/center][size=3]
[center][color=#1155Cc][size=5]~Requirements~[/size][/color]
[size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58357]Anna NPCs by Anduniel

[/url]﻿[/size][size=4]Please make sure to load my mod... For the mod... After Anna NPCs. X3[/size]
[color=#1155Cc]
[size=5]~Overhauled NPCs~[/size][/color]
[size=4]* Anduniel
* Azura
* Crystal
* Jade
* Nadina
* Patrizia
* Ruby
* Tatiyana[/size]
[color=#1155Cc]
[/color][size=4][color=#1155Cc][size=5]~Q & A~[/size][/color]
[color=#85200C]Q. Why are you doing this?[/color]
[color=#BF9000]A. Because I can. :3[/color]
[color=#85200C]Q. Is this compatible with other NPC overhauls?[/color]
[color=#BF9000]A. Yes, as long as you either
a. Load both the files and plug-in of mod 1 after the other mod(s)
b. Delete the NPCs you don’t want by deleting the records for them in the
plug-ins and their corresponding FaceTint and FaceGeom, found in meshes
and textures.[/color]
[color=#85200C]Q. Is this compatible with race overhauls (like EEO)?[/color]
[color=#BF9000]A. No, unless you delete all the NPC data affected from my mod.[/color]
[color=#85200C]Q. There is a neck seam/face doesn’t match the body![/color]
[color=#BF9000]A. Try changing the NPCs weight with the following instructions
1. Open the console with ~
2. Click on the NPC
3. setnpcweight (any number between 00 and 100)[/color][/size]

[color=#1155Cc][size=5]~Credits~[/size][/color]

[color=#741B47][i][size=6]Thanks to all modders for their wonderful tutorials and resources! And a shout out to Anduniel for her lovely mod and for letting me overhaul it! (^_^)~[/size][/i][/color][/size][/center][/size]
author: TheK8iKat
